item.title: About me
item.description: My name is Eduardo Aleixo! I am originally from the country side Sao Paulo, now living in the capital (also named Sao Paulo). Still adapting to the big city. I currently do remote work for Translucent Computing, it's been lots of fun there! I'm (at the moment) interested professionally in: programming/operations/devops (i am a firmly believer of the devops culture) kubernetes (it's complex but we can do amazing things with it) and its ecossystem (containers, distributed systems, observability, stateless workloads) functional programming, static typing etc user experience (i like pretty, simple and useful design) My personal interests revolve around:
